Packages that use Event
Package
Description
com.eventApp.DAO
Data Access Object (DAO) package for database operations in CampusConnect.
com.eventApp.DataStructures
Custom data structures package for optimized data handling in CampusConnect.
com.eventApp.Service
Service package containing business logic for the CampusConnect system.

    Method
    Description
    List<Event>
    EventDAO.getEventList(String approvalStatus, String completionStatus)
    Retrieves events filtered by both approval status and completion status.
    List<Event>
    EventDAO.getMyEventList(String userId)

    Method
    Description
